Agentforce and AI App Development

Start AI app development with Agentforce across your organisation, grounded in your data. Empower business users, admins and developers to embed AI into every business solution quickly with no code, low code and pro code tools. Equip admins and developers with AI-powered tools so they can work faster and more efficiently. Build, test and deploy every solution securely and with governance, using native tools that make it easy to follow modern DevOps processes on Salesforce.

Get the DevOps guide Watch the webinar

Enterprise App Development FAQ

It's the process of creating software applications specifically designed to meet the complex needs of large organizations (enterprises). These applications are typically built to support business operations, improve productivity, streamline workflows, and ensure data security at scale.

Salesforce Enterprise App Development involves using Salesforce's tools, frameworks, and APIs to design, build, and deploy apps that work natively with Salesforce's ecosystem (CRM, analytics, automation, etc.).

Call us at 1800-420-7332

Build, test, and release quickly with a strong DevSecOps strategy.

Learn how DevSecOps enables secure, reliable innovation.

A strong DevSecOps strategy equips your teams with the tools to scale efficiently, test changes safely, and deliver your Agentforce fast. Read the guide to learn how to:

  • Achieve faster, more secure application & agent deployment
  • Accelerate development on the Salesforce Platform with a DevSecOps culture
  • Reduce IT costs with the help of Salesforce

Salesforce Webinars

Questions? Call us at 1-800-667-6389

Accelerate Application Development on Salesforce

On-Demand Webinar

Featured Speakers:

  • Louise Gilmour, Salesforce Administrator, Make-a-Wish Canada
  • Margot Tollefsen Product Marketing Manager - Platform, Salesforce
  • Jonathan Zhu, Distinguished Technical Architect, Salesforce

88% of IT professionals are struggling to keep pace with increasing development demands. In this session, you'll learn how Salesforce's application development tools and frameworks help enhance developer and admin efficiency to deliver high-quality applications on the Einstein 1 Platform. Hear firsthand how Make-a-Wish transformed their application deployment with DevOps Center, secure testing environments, and how they intend to embed AI across their organization.

Access the webinar now.
